snippet: Several people were taken to hospitals after possibly being exposed to lead paint dust in a House office building, the authorities said.
abstract: Ten cafeteria employees at Capitol's Longworth House Office Building in Washingon, DC, are transported to hospitals after possible exposure to lead paint dust which may have been released in kitchen area during overnight construction.
lead_paragraph: Several people were taken to hospitals after possibly being exposed to lead paint dust in a House office building, the authorities said.

headline.main: Workers Sickened at House Office Building
headline.print_headline: Workers Sickened at House Office Building
